title: Still no Star Guardian Icon
body:
Hi,

I did that star guardian quiz when it was released, but i still have not recieved my icon. Did the quiz multiple times in 2-3 weeks time, cus i didn't get it. Should've gotten it by now.. Whatsup rito? lel

replies.body: That's really strange to hear, from what I understand all of the icons were already distributed to eligible accounts.  Were you logged into the correct account at the time of taking the quiz?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look, but I can't guarantee anything.  We'll reply back asap!
